Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 78th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1968...
Injured on 9/4/1968 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/31/1971 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 6/19/1972 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/25/1974 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/9/1974, off Wally Flanagan (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/22/1974, off Phillip Serpa (Min)...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1977...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/13/1980 to a 4-year deal worth $350,000 per year...
